news.title: Conor McGregor’s bid to further appeal Nikita Hand case is rejected by Supreme Court
news.summary: The Supreme Court has decided not to grant mixed martial arts star Conor McGregor and his friend James Lawrence further appeals against the outcome of the Nikita Hand civil rape case.

news.title: ‘Unconscionable’ – RTÉ to boycott Eurovision Song Contest 2026 over Israel inclusion
news.summary: RTÉ will not participate or air the 2026 Eurovision song contest after it was confirmed that Israel can compete in the contest next year.

news.title: Crystal meth businessman Nathan McDonnell faces forfeiture of part of sale of €795,000 home to Revenue
news.summary: A businessman (44) who was jailed for 12 years for importation of the State's largest ever crystal meth seizure now faces having part of the proceeds from the impending sale of his €795,000 family home forfeit to the taxman, the High Court heard.

news.title: Westmeath player wins overnight Lotto jackpot of more than €6 million
news.summary: One lucky player in Co Westmeath has won a jackpot over €6 million in Wednesday night’s draw, the National Lottery has announced.

news.title: Serial sex offender who tried to strangle woman in Dublin park argues DNA evidence should not have been introduced at trial
news.summary: A predatory serial sex offender jailed for attempting to strangle a woman in a Dublin park has argued that DNA evidence found on a cigarette packet near the location of the attack should not have been introduced into his trial.

news.title: ‘I didn’t sign up for this’: Irish parents on coping when their adult children are still living at home
news.summary: Currently, almost 70pc of 25-year-olds in Ireland are residing in the family home, mostly for financial reasons, according to research from the CSO’s  Longitudinal Growing Up in Ireland (GUI) study .

news.title: 'Don't make the same choice': Coroner's plea after death of woman (24) on birthday night out
news.summary: A coroner has warned that anyone thinking of taking drugs this festive season is playing a dangerous game of “Russian roulette” after finding a young Belfast woman died of a lethal mix of alcohol, ketamine and cocaine.

news.title: Just Between Us: ‘Your gut is everything’ – Kate Brayden on cheating, betrayal and beginning again
news.summary: Jennifer sits down with journalist Kate Brayden, who experienced two very different experiences of infidelity almost a decade apart. The first spiralled into toxicity and self-blame; years later, counselling helped her name what happened and begin to reclaim her self-worth. The second revealed something else entirely: incompatibility, insecurity, and a moment of self-sabotage.

news.title: Restaurant review: ‘I’m pre-programmed not to like this new Italian but even a curmudgeon like me can’t helping falling head over heels for it’
news.summary: Gloria Osteria has opened in the former AIB bank on Westmoreland Street. A red ribbon has been strung across the entrance to the building.

news.title: Dublin father stabbed man to death outside home to protect his property and family, court told
news.summary: A Dublin dad told gardaí that he stabbed a man to death outside his home to protect his property and his family and a jury will be asked to decide whether his actions amounted to murder.
